snippet.title: Pekoe - Official Trailer | Game Devs of Color Expo 2024
snippet.description: Pekoe leaves Early Access and will be releasing Version 1.0 in Q4 2024. Check out the latest trailer for Pekoe for this cozy cat-filled tea-making simulator about taking the time for self-care and connecting with what makes you happy. In Pekoe, build relationships, upgrade your teahouse, and discover new recipes as you work towards creating a place you can call home.
